discussion.content: The FIRST step the project manager should take to alter the pace of the project is to evaluate the current project schedule and identify opportunities to expedite the project timeline. This could include re-sequencing of activities, adding additional resources, or finding efficiencies in current processes. Once the project manager has identified potential solutions, they can present these to the project sponsor along with any associated risks and benefits.
